doc:
Julie Stevens (American radio actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julie_Stevens_(American_radio_actress) 0 Julie Stevens (November 23, 1916 - August 26, 1984) was an American actress who performed on radio, television, the stage, and in movies. She is best known for her 16-year run as the title character in The Romance of Helen Trent on radio. Julie_Stevens ( November_23_,_1916 - August_26_,_1984 ) was an_American_actress who performed on radio_,_television , the_stage , and in movies . She is_best_known for her_16-year_run as the_title_character in The_Romance of Helen_Trent on radio .
